statements: SELECT * FROM in_game_inventory WHERE player_name = 'Alice';
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM in_game_inventory WHERE player_id = 123;
SELECT player_id, player_name, item_id, item_name, quantity FROM in_game_inventory ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_name, item_name FROM in_game_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_id, player_name FROM in_game_inventory WHERE item_name LIKE '%sword%';
SELECT player_id, player_name, quantity FROM in_game_inventory WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM in_game_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY player_id DESC, item_id ASC;
SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity FROM in_game_inventory WHERE item_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, item_name, quantity FROM in_game_inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY player_id, quantity DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT player_id, player_name, item_id, quantity FROM in_game_inventory WHERE player_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY item_id;
SELECT * FROM items
SELECT item_name, item_type FROM items ORDER BY item_type ASC
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM items WHERE item_type = 'Weapon'
SELECT * FROM inventories WHERE player_id = 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM items INNER JOIN inventories ON items.item_id = inventories.item_id
SELECT * FROM items WHERE item_id = 1 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_type FROM items WHERE item_type = 'Armor' ORDER BY item_id ASC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_type, item_description FROM items WHERE item_description LIKE '%sword%' ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_type FROM items WHERE item_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY item_type ASC, item_name ASC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_description FROM items WHERE item_name LIKE '%health%' AND item_type = 'Potion' ORDER BY item_id ASC;
SELECT player_name, game_name, item_name, quantity FROM indie_game_inventory;
SELECT game_name, quantity, player_name FROM indie_game_inventory;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity, player_name FROM indie_game_inventory;
SELECT game_id, game_name, player_name, quantity FROM indie_game_inventory;
SELECT quantity, player_name, game_name, item_name FROM indie_game_inventory;
SELECT player_name, game_name, quantity FROM indie_game_inventory WHERE player_id = 1
SELECT * FROM indie_game_inventory WHERE game_id = 3 ORDER BY player_name DESC
SELECT player_name, item_name FROM indie_game_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_id ASC, quantity DESC
SELECT DISTINCT player_id, player_name FROM indie_game_inventory WHERE item_id = 5
SELECT player_name, game_name, item_name FROM indie_game_inventory WHERE player_id IN (2,4)
SELECT * FROM player_inventory;
SELECT * FROM item WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player WHERE player_level > 10;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM item ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player WHERE player_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM player_inventory WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT player_id, item_id, quantity FROM player_inventory ORDER BY player_id ASC, item_id DESC
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM item WHERE item_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player WHERE player_level >= 50 ORDER BY player_name
SELECT game_name, release_date FROM game WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT player_name, email FROM Players ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, description FROM Items WHERE item_name LIKE '%sword%';
SELECT player_name, transaction_date FROM Players INNER JOIN Transactions ON Players.player_id = Transactions.player_id;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT player_name, email FROM Players WHERE player_id = 100;
SELECT item_name, description FROM Items WHERE item_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity FROM Players p JOIN PlayerInventory pi ON p.player_id = pi.player_id WHERE p.player_id = 200;
SELECT player_name, item_name, transaction_date FROM Transactions t JOIN Players p ON t.player_id = p.player_id JOIN Items i ON t.item_id = i.item_id WHERE t.transaction_id = 500;
